title: Richard Porter (Top Gear, The Grand Tour)
description:
Richard Porter is one of the greatest minds behind 2 of the greatest automotive shows ever: BBC's "Top Gear",  and "The Grand Tour". He knows cars and jokes. Just listen. 

 

This show is also a video: https://youtu.be/D_-maTGOw7M

 

Richard's work: 

https://sniffpetrol.com/author/richardporter/

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCetcgTqJiNFKYipfBT1YIWQ

https://www.amazon.com/That-Bombshell-Inside-Madness-Genius/dp/1409165078

 

Follow us!

T: @thesmokingtire @zackklapman 

IG: @thesmokingtire @fakezackklapman 

 

NEW SHIRTS!

https://www.blipshift.com/tst
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
